snippet: An autopsy report indicates a teenage Mexican boy who was apparently fatally shot by a United States Border Patrol agent in October was struck by at least eight bullets, all but one hitting him in the back.
abstract: Autopsy report indicates teenage Mexican boy who was apparently fatally shot by United States Border Patrol agent in Oct 2012 was struck by at least eight bullets, all but one hitting him in the back; shooting occurred at fence along border with Mexico in Nogales, Ariz.
lead_paragraph: An autopsy report indicates a teenage Mexican boy who was apparently fatally shot by a United States Border Patrol agent in October was struck by at least eight bullets, all but one hitting him in the back.

headline.main: Arizona: Boy Killed by Border Agent Was Shot 8 Times
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Boy Killed By Border Agent Was Shot 8 Times
